original_text: The priests then brought the ark of the Lord’s covenant to its place in the inner sanctuary of the temple, the Most Holy Place, and put it beneath the wings of the cherubim.
korean_text: 제사장들이 여호와의 언약궤를 그 처소로 메어 들였으니 곧 본전 지성소 그룹들의 날개 아래라

sentences.original_text: The priests then brought the ark of the Lord's covenant
to its place in the inner sanctuary of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 성전 안 지성소에 있는 그 자리로

sentences.original_text: and put it beneath the wings of the cherubim
